abstract: Over at the India Ink blog, Rocky Singh and Mayur Sharma, two popular television personalities in India, help readers navigate the Durga Puja festival in Kolkata, which celebrates the Hindu goddess Durga's slaying of the demon Mahishasur.

headline.main: Looking for the "Big Taste" of Bengal
